1TIM 5.24 sumaize manne frawaurhteis swikunþos sind faurbisniwandeins du stauai;
sumaizeh þan jah afargaggand.
1TIM 5.25 samaleiko þan jah waurstwa goda swikunþa sind, jah þoei aljaleikos sik habandona filhan ni mahta sind.
1TIM 6.1 Swa managai swe sijaina uf jukuzjai skalkans, seinans fraujans allaizos sweriþos wairþans rahnjaina, ei namo fraujins jah laiseins ni wajamerjaidau.
1TIM 6.2 aþþan þaiei galaubjandans haband fraujans, ni frakunneina, unte broþrjus sind, ak mais skalkinona, unte galaubjandans sind jah liubai, þaiei wailadedais gadailans sind.
þata laisei jah gaþlaih.

1TIM 6.3 jabai ƕas aljaleikos laisjai janni atgaggiþ du hailaim waurdam þaim fraujins unsaris Iesuis Xristaus jah þizai bi gagudein laiseinai, 1TIM 6.4 iþ hauhþuhts, ni waiht witands, ak siukands bi soknins jah waurdajiukos, us þaimei wairþand neiþa, haifsteis, anaqisseis, anamindeis ubilos, 1TIM 6.5 usbalþeins frawardidaize manne ahin, at þaimei gatarniþ ist sunja, hugjandane faihugawaurki wisan gagudein;
afstand af þaim swaleikaim.
1TIM 6.6 aþþan ist gawaurki mikil gagudei miþ ganauhin.
1TIM 6.7 ni waiht auk brahtedum in þamma fairƕau;
bi sunjai þatei ni usbairan ƕa magum.
1TIM 6.8 aþþan habandans usfodein jah gaskadwein þaimuh ganohidai sijaima.
1TIM 6.9 aþþan þaiei wileina gabigai wairþan atdriusand in fraistubnja jah hlamma unhulþins jah lustuns managans unnutjans jah skaþulans, þaiei saggqjand mans in frawardein jah fralust.
1TIM 6.10 waurts allaize ubilaize ist faihugeiro, þizozei sumai gairnjandans afairzidai waurþun af galaubeinai jassik silbans gaþiwaidedun sairam managaim.
1TIM 6.11 iþ þu, jai manna gudis, þata þliuhais, iþ laistjais garaihtein, gagudein, galaubein, frijaþwa, þulain, qairrein.
1TIM 6.12 haifstei þo godon haifst galaubeinais,
undgreip libain aiweinon du þizaiei laþoþs is jah andhaihaist þamma godin andahaita in andwairþja...weitwode...
1TIM 6.13 _biuda andwairþja gudis...

1TIM 6.15 þanei in melam swesaim taikneiþ sa audaga jah ains mahteiga jah þiudans þiudanondane jah frauja fraujinondane, 1TIM 6.16 saei ains aih undiwanein jah liuhaþ bauiþ unatgaht, þanei saƕ manne ni ainshun nih saiƕan mag...
2TIM Incipit.0 Du Teimauþaiau anþara.
2TIM 1.1 Pawlus, apaustaulus Iesuis Xristaus þairh wiljan gudis bi gahaitam libainais sei ist in Xristau Iesu 2TIM 1.2 Teimauþaiau, liubin barna,
ansts, armaio, gawairþi fram guda attin jah Xristau Iesu fraujin unsaramma.

2TIM 1.3 awiliudo guda meinamma, þammei skalkino fram fadreinam in hrainjai gahugdai, ƕaiwa unsweibando haba bi þuk gaminþi in bidom meinaim naht jah daga, 2TIM 1.4 gairnjands þuk gasaiƕan, gamunands tagre þeinaize, ei fahedais usfullnau, 2TIM 1.5 gamaudein andnimands þizos sei ist in þus unliutons galaubeinais sei bauaida faurþis in awon þeinai Lauidjai jah aiþein þeinai Aiwneikai, ga-traua-þ-þan þatei jah in þus.
2TIM 1.6 in þizozei waihtais gamaudja þuk anaqiujan anst gudis, sei ist in þus þairh analagein handiwe meinaizo.
2TIM 1.7 unte ni gaf unsis guþ ahman faurhteins, ak mahtais jah frijaþwos jah inaheins.

2TIM 1.8 ni nunu skamai þuk weitwodiþos fraujins unsaris Iesuis nih meina, bandjins is, ak miþarbaidei aiwaggeljon bi mahtai gudis, 2TIM 1.9 þis nasjandins uns jah laþondins uns laþonai weihai, ni bi waurstwam unsaraim, ak bi seinai leikainai jah anstai sei gibana ist unsis in Xristau Iesu faur mela aiweina, 2TIM 1.10 iþ gaswikunþida nu þairh gabairhtein nasjandis unsaris Iesuis Xristaus gatairandins raihtis dauþau, iþ galiuhtjandins libain jah unriurein þairh aiwaggeljon, 2TIM 1.11 in þoei gasatiþs im ik merjands jah apaustaulus jah laisareis þiudo,
2TIM 1.12 in þizozei fairinos jah þata winna;
